price: 193. La dagaallama (gaalada) si ayna u jirin wax dambe oo fidmo ahi (iyo dulmi), Diintuna u ahaato tan Alle oo keliya. Hadday ka joogaan (shirkiga iyo macaasida), markaa waa inaan colaad loo qaadin waxaan ahayn daalimiinta.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُوهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتۡنَةٞ وَيَكُونَ ٱلدِّينُ لِلَّهِۖ فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَلَا عُدۡوَٰنَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqātilūhum ḥattā lā takūna fit'natun wayakūna al-dīnu lillahi fa-ini intahaw falā ʿud'wāna illā ʿalā al-ẓālimīna
